bodystyle: img { max-width: 80%; height: auto; } body { padding: 10px; overflow: hidden; } table thead th {background: #dadada; padding: 10px 15px;} table tbody td {padding: 10px 15px;} table tbody tr:nth-child(even){background: #f5f5f5;}
dark_bodystyle: img { max-width: 80%; height: auto; } body { padding: 10px; overflow: hidden; background:rgba(0, 0, 0, 0); color: rgb(238, 238, 238);} table thead th {background: #444; padding: 10px 15px;} table tbody td {padding: 10px 15px;} table tbody tr:nth-child(even){background: #333;} blockquote {border-left: 5px solid #444;} code { background-color: #444; color: rgb(255 37 78);} pre {background-color: #444;color: rgb(238, 238, 238);border: 1px solid #333;} a {color: #79c0ff;}
